en-US.STR_ISCSI_CONFIG_INIT_NAME_HELP: The worldwide unique name of iSCSI Initiator. Only IQN format is accepted.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_ATTEMPT_NAME_HELP: The human name defined for this attempt.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_CONFIG_RETRY_HELP: The minimum value is 0 and the maximum is 16. 0 means no retry.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_CONFIG_TIMEOUT_HELP: The timeout value in milliseconds. The minimum value is 100 milliseconds and the maximum is 20 seconds.
en-US.STR_IP_MODE_HELP: Initiator IP address is system assigned in IP6 mode. In Autoconfigure mode, iSCSI driver will attempt to connect iSCSI target via IPv4 stack, if failed then attempt IPv6 stack.
en-US.STR_AUTHEN_TYPE_HELP: Authentication method: CHAP, Kerberos, or None
en-US.STR_ISCSI_IP_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter IP address in dotted-decimal notation.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_TARGET_NAME_HELP: The worldwide unique name of the target. Only iqn. format is accepted.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_TARGET_ADDRESS_HELP: Enter Target address in IPv4,IPv6 or URL format.You need to configure DNS server address in advance if input a URL string.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_BOOT_LUN_HELP: Hexadecimal representation of the LU number. Examples are: 4752-3A4F-6b7e-2F99, 6734-9-156f-127, 4186-9
en-US.STR_CHAP_TYPE_HELP: None, One way CHAP or mutual CHAP
en-US.STR_ISCSI_CHAP_SECRET_HELP: The minimum length is 12 bytes and the maximum length is 16 bytes.
en-US.STR_SAVE_CHANGES_HELP: Must reboot system manually for changes to take place.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_CONFIG_ISID_HELP: OUI-format ISID in 6 bytes, default value are derived from MAC address. Only last 3 bytes are configurable. Example: update 0ABBCCDDEEFF to 0ABBCCF07901 by input F07901.
en-US.STR_ISCSI_MAC_PROMPT: Configure the mac address for the attempt
en-US.STR_ISCSI_ISID_HELP: The iSCSI ISID. Default value are derived from MAC address. Only last 3 bytes are configurable.
